name: Chicken Hunter (itch) (Rama)
description:
Joe is a young man who lives in the village.  joe's village has problems caused by chickens. They are disturbing the villagers, as a young man in the village, Joe intends to hunt down the chickens that have been troubling the villagers, using a gun he bought in the city, so the mission of hunting chickens begins.

Use WASD to move and left click to shoot.
